item.title: 金管局将员工迁至九龙摩天大楼以降低成本、增加空间
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港金融管理局正在将 100 多名员工迁往海港对面九龙的一座摩天大楼，以节省成本，同时提供更多的工作空间。【原文：The Hong Kong Monetary Authority is moving more than 100 employees across the harbor to a skyscraper in Kowloon to save costs while providing more working space, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 阿达尼集团考虑增发 12 亿美元债券
item.description: 亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的企业集团正考虑在 6 月前再发行 12 亿美元的美元债券，熟悉此事的人士称，该公司本周刚刚发行了一笔票据，这也是今年主要以新债形式筹集至少 20 亿美元计划的一部分。【原文：Billionaire Gautam Adani’s conglomerate is considering offering another $1.2 billion of dollar bonds by June, people familiar with the matter said, fresh off a note issuance this week that was also part of plans to raise at least $2 billion in mostly new debt this year.】

item.title: 乌干达先令在利率决定前创下七个月来最大涨幅
item.description: 乌干达先令在坎帕拉创下七个月来最大升幅，此前中央银行货币政策委员会将于周三晚些时候召开一次计划外会议。【原文：Uganda’s shilling advanced the most in seven months in Kampala before an unscheduled meeting of the central bank’s monetary policy committee later on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚和东盟敦促在南海紧张局势中保持克制
item.description: 在中国和菲律宾船只相撞引发有争议水道新一轮紧张局势的前一天，澳大利亚和东南亚国家警告不要采取 "危及 "南海和平的行动，并呼吁自我克制。【原文：Australia and Southeast Asian nations warned against actions that “endanger peace” in the South China Sea and called for self-restraint, a day after a collision between Chinese and Philippines vessels sparked new tensions in the contested waterway.】

item.title: 中国捍卫 5%目标，誓言 "大力 "发展经济
item.description: 中国一位高级官员为中国今年经济增长 5% 左右的计划进行了辩护，一天前，这一雄心勃勃的目标遭到了一些经济学家的质疑。【原文：A top Chinese official defended his nation’s plan to grow the economy by around 5% this year, a day after the ambitious target was met with skepticism by some economists.】

item.title: 日本一家小型造船厂股票的营业额高于丰田汽车
item.description: 日本一家小型造船厂成为周三东京股市交易最活跃的股票，超过了全球最大的汽车制造商丰田汽车公司。【原文：A small Japanese shipbuilder was the most actively traded stock by value in Tokyo on Wednesday, surpassing the world’s largest automaker Toyota Motor Corp.】

item.title: 苏丹战争有可能引发 2,500 万人的饥饿危机
item.description: 世界粮食计划署执行主任辛迪.麦凯恩（Cindy McCain）说，苏丹战争已危及苏丹、南苏丹和乍得各地 2,500 万人的粮食安全，使其成为全球最大的饥饿危机，她呼吁畅通无阻的准入和更多的资金来帮助社区。【原文：Sudan’s war has put food security at risk for 25 million people across Sudan, South Sudan, and Chad, making it the biggest hunger crisis worldwide, World Food Programme Executive Director Cindy McCain said, calling for unimpeded access and more funding to help communities.】

item.title: EQT 旗下 Galderma 公司寻求在瑞士上市，筹资 23 亿美元
item.description: 护肤品公司 Galderma Group AG 正在寻求融资约 23 亿美元，预计这将是今年欧洲最大的上市交易之一，也是对该地区首次公开募股市场的一次重要考验。【原文：Skincare business Galderma Group AG is looking to raise about $2.3 billion in what’s expected to be one of the largest listings in Europe this year, serving as a key test for the region’s initial public offering market.】

item.title: 全球基金紧抓中国债务不放，即使供应风险迫在眉睫
item.description: 外国投资者对中国债券持乐观态度，即使在中国政府誓言提高发债量之后也是如此，因为他们预计中国将在经济复苏乏力的情况下保持流动性宽松。【原文：Foreign investors sounded optimism in Chinese bonds even after Beijing vowed higher debt issuance, as they expect the nation to keep liquidity loose amid a sluggish economic recovery.】

item.description:

。【原文：

item.description:

A group of people came together last month to tackle the worst-case scenario for one of the best-fed regions in the world.

item.title: 印度对俄罗斯石油合同持谨慎态度，因为美国制裁正咄咄逼人
item.description: 印度的国营炼油厂正在回避与俄罗斯签订的原油供应合同，因为在美国更严格的制裁措施下，一度繁荣的俄罗斯原油贸易变得更加困难。【原文：India’s state-run oil refiners are shying away from contracted Russian crude supply as the once-booming trade becomes much harder under tighter enforcement of US sanctions.】

item.title: 比特币和黄金双双创下历史新高，市场反差令人震惊
item.description: 比特币和黄金屡创新高，有可能会对全球市场的风险偏好发出喜忧参半的信息。【原文：Record highs for Bitcoin and gold are threatening to send mixed messages about the appetite for risk across global markets.】

item.title: 比特币在突破 69,000 美元的记录后出现回调
item.description: 比特币在两年多的时间里首次飙升至创纪录的水平，随后由于交易者获利回吐而迅速回落。【原文：Bitcoin surged to a record for the first time in more than two years before rapidly retreating as traders took some profits.】

item.title: 杰富瑞称中国国家队股票反弹可能放缓
item.description: 据杰富瑞金融集团（Jefferies Financial Group Inc.【原文：Equity purchases by Chinese government-led funds aimed at supporting the market will likely slow down if mainland stock benchmarks can hold their recent rebound, according to Jefferies Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 中国最大焦煤生产商呼吁国家控制供应
item.description: 中国最大的煤矿企业董事长表示，中国炼焦煤行业需要更多的国家保护，包括限制供应。【原文：China’s coking coal industry needs more state protection, including restrictions on supply, according to the chairman of the biggest miner.】

item.title: 受降息押注和避风港竞标影响，黄金价格在创下历史新高后保持稳定
item.description: 受美国降息预期、地缘政治紧张局势和股市回落风险的提振，黄金在上一交易日飙升至历史新高后回稳。【原文：Gold steadied after surging to a record high in the previous session, boosted by expectations for US rate cuts, geopolitical tensions and the risk of a pullback for equity markets.】

item.title: 全球债券资金流入帮助卢比扭转新兴市场货币跌势
item.description: 印度卢比在今年前两个月的表现优于所有新兴市场国家，为 2024 年的强劲表现奠定了基础，因为印度被纳入全球债券指数刺激了资金流入。【原文：The Indian rupee outperformed all its emerging market peers in the first two months of the year, setting the stage for a strong 2024 as the nation’s inclusion in global bond indexes spur inflows.】

item.title: 加拿大养老金因中国股市暴跌而削减 10%的香港职位
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士透露，加拿大养老金计划投资委员会本周裁撤了其大中华区公共股票团队的约十几个职位，占其香港员工总数的近 10%。【原文：Canada Pension Plan Investment Board has eliminated about a dozen positions in its Greater China public equities team this week, representing close to 10% of its Hong Kong staff, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 激进基金瞄准日经最缺股票 Aozora
item.description: 一家激进基金已成为日本青空银行（Aozora Bank Ltd.）的最大股东，而青空银行是日本蓝筹股中股价缩水最多的股票。【原文：An activist fund has become the biggest shareholder in Japan’s Aozora Bank Ltd., the most-shorted stock on the country’s blue-chip gauge, pitting it against speculators betting on further declines following the lender’s massive losses tied to US properties.】

item.title: 无法投保的美国住宅正在酝酿一场新的金融危机
item.description: 从加利福尼亚州到佛罗里达州，私营保险公司纷纷撤出最易受气候灾害影响的美国市场，"不得已而为之 "的州立房屋保险计划正在承担数万亿美元的风险。【原文：“Last resort” state home insurance programs are taking on trillions of dollars in risk as private insurers pull out of the US markets most susceptible to climate disaster, from California to Florida.】

item.title: 行业报告显示美国库存增加，石油止跌回升
item.description: 一份报告显示，美国库存继续增加，表明供应可能超过需求，石油在下跌后企稳。【原文：Oil steadied after a decline as a report showed US inventories are continuing to expand, a sign supply may be running ahead of demand.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国科技股看涨押注创三年新高。新兴市场货币摇摆不定。苹果公司在华 iPhone 销量大跌。市场动向如下。【原文：Good morning. Bullish US tech bets hit three-year high. Emerging market currencies waver. Apple's China iPhone sales plunge. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国国会讲话前亚洲股市涨跌不一：市场综述
item.description: 在中国官方宣布雄心勃勃的5%经济增长目标之后，亚洲股市涨跌不一，投资者重点关注即将召开的中国政策会议新闻发布会。交易员们还在等待美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的证词。【原文：Stocks in Asia were mixed as investors focused on an upcoming press conference at China’s policy meeting after official announcements of an ambitious 5% growth target. Traders also awaited testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell.】

item.title: 对冲基金债券空头减少表明交易基础解除
item.description: 杠杆基金正在积极平仓国债期货的短期头寸。由于国债收益率居高不下，对冲基金似乎正在兑现看跌的赌注，但部分平仓可能反映了期货对现货基差交易的缓和。【原文：Leveraged funds are aggressively unwinding short-duration positions in Treasury futures. While hedge funds appear to be cashing in on bearish wagers as Treasury yields remain elevated, part of the unwind may be reflecting a moderation to the futures-versus-cash basis trade.】

item.title: 欧佩克+延长减产后沙特将油价推向亚洲
item.description: 在欧佩克+集团同意将减产延长到今年年中之后，沙特阿拉伯提高了下个月向亚洲买家提供的主要石油等级的价格。【原文：Saudi Arabia increased prices of its main oil grade to buyers in Asia next month after the OPEC+ group agreed to extend output cuts into the middle of the year.】

item.title: Capital One 高管称投资者对 Discover 交易持乐观态度
item.description: Capital One Financial Corp. 的一位高管表示，投资者普遍对该公司收购 Discover Financial Services 的计划持积极态度，他们的问题主要集中在交易批准前的监管障碍上。【原文：A Capital One Financial Corp. executive said investors have generally been positive about the company’s plans to acquire Discover Financial Services, focusing their questions primarily on the regulatory hurdles ahead of the deal’s approval.】

item.title: NYCB 股价在连续两天下跌至 1996 年水平后反弹
item.description: 纽约社区银行（New York Community Bancorp）周二大涨 18%，平息了两天来股价跌至 1996 年以来最低点的颓势。【原文：New York Community Bancorp surged 18% on Tuesday, paring a two-day rout that had taken the shares to the lowest level since 1996.】

item.title: Cenovus 公司抨击加拿大政府对碳捕集缺乏支持
item.description: 赛诺沃斯能源公司（Cenovus Energy Inc）指责加拿大政府没有为油砂行业提议的价值 165 亿加元（122 亿美元）的碳捕集系统提供足够的财政支持。【原文：Cenovus Energy Inc. blasted the Canadian government for not providing enough financial support for the oil-sands industry’s proposed C$16.5 billion ($12.2 billion) carbon capture system.】
